SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" @echo off :ENDIF
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.COMMON_LOGGING
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_OBJ_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Object type" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_OBJ_TYPE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Version number" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_VERSION_NUMBER#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Folder name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_FOLDER_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Persistent input file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_PERSISTENT_FILE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Check in comment" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_CHECKIN_COMMENT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Column separator" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_COL_SEPARATOR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "End of record separator" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_REC_SEPARATOR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "End of listing indicator" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_LIST_INDICATOR#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Validate options" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_IPC_OPTIONS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! logging start of execution : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT
!------------------------------------------ VALIDATING INPUT PARAMETERS ---------------------------------------- ! create command to connect to repository : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGIN_REPOSITORY !------------------------------------------ CREATING PMREP COMMANDLET ------------------------------------------ : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "VALIDATE OBJECT CMD EXECUTION" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ! prepare command to validate object : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = "pmrep validate"
! Object name : IF &UC4RB_IPC_OBJ_NAME# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_OBJ_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -n &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Object type : IF &UC4RB_IPC_OBJ_TYPE# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_OBJ_TYPE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -o &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Version number : IF &UC4RB_IPC_VERSION_NUMBER# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_VERSION_NUMBER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -v &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Folder name : IF &UC4RB_IPC_FOLDER_NAME# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_FOLDER_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -f &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Persistent input file : IF &UC4RB_IPC_PERSISTENT_FILE# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_PERSISTENT_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -i &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Output Option Types : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -p all")
! Validate options : DEFINE &OPTIONS_ARRAY#, string, 3 : SET &OPTIONS_VARA# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PRV.VARA.VALIDATE_OPTIONS" : SET &CHECKBOX_OPTIONS# = &UC4RB_IPC_OPTIONS# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CHECKBOX_VALUES_AS_ARG : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, &OPTIONS#)
! Check in comment : IF &UC4RB_IPC_CHECKIN_COMMENT# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_CHECKIN_COMMENT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -m &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Column separator : IF &UC4RB_IPC_COL_SEPARATOR# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_COL_SEPARATOR# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -c &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! End of record separator : IF &UC4RB_IPC_REC_SEPARATOR# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_REC_SEPARATOR# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -r &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! End of listing indicator : IF &UC4RB_IPC_LIST_INDICATOR# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_LIST_INDICATOR# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#, " -l &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
!------------------------------------------ EXECUTING PMREP COMMANDLETS ------------------------------------------- ! LOGGING COMMAND LINE : SET &LOGGING_COMMAND# = &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_COMMAND &UC4RB_IPC_CREATE_CMDLET#
:IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" SET ERROR=%ERRORLEVEL% : ELSE error=$? :ENDIF
!------------------------------------------ DISCONNECTING FROM REPOSITORY ----------------------------------------- :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.PMREP_CLEANUP
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** VALIDATE OBJECT ACTION FAILED ********" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@GENERIC
!-------------------------------------------SUCCESS MESSAGE-------------------------------------------------------- !Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** VALIDATE OBJECT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
